quotes: In 1990, he earned a Bachelor of Laws from Yonsei University.
He later obtained a Master of Public Administration, with a concentration in urban and local governance, from Yonsei University's Graduate School of Public Administration in 1999.
Kim began his political career as a legislative aide to National Assembly member Shin Kye-ryoon in the early 1990s.
He was elected as a member of the Nowon District Council in 1995
served in the Seoul Metropolitan Council from 1998 to 2002.
In 2002, Kim served as a welfare policy advisor to then-presidential candidate Roh Moo-hyun.
serving from 2003 to 2007.
He ran unsuccessfully for the National Assembly in 2008
He won the mayoralty of Nowon District in the 2010 local elections
He was re-elected in 2014 with an increased vote share
and held the position until early 2018.
In 2018, Kim successfully ran for the National Assembly in a by-election
Kim was re-elected in the 2020 general election
and, in 2024, was elected to represent the Nowon District Eul constituency.
including Chief of Staff to the Party Leader (2018–2020)
Chief Deputy Floor Leader for Planning (2021–2022)
Chair of the Policy Committee (2022–2023)
